txt.en:
[placeholder],

There are always more tales to be told, and it just so happens that there is another which I think you will become a part. Seek me out in the Prancing Pony, and we can discuss the matter.

Burt Nine-tales
'Hullo, friend, it is good to see you. Now ready yourself, for there is something that needs doing, and I think that you are prepared as well as you need be to help.'
You received a letter from your trainer in Bree-town asking for you to return to him. Apparently, there is something that he wishes to teach you.
Bring the letter to Burt Nine-tales in Bree
Burt Nine-tales sent you a letter requesting that you visit him at the Prancing Pony in Bree.\n\nDeliver the letter to Burt Nine-tales at the Prancing Pony in Bree.
